name: Addictive Candy Games Blitz - The Match-3 Fruit Jelly Mania HD FREE
name_original: Addictive Candy Games Blitz - The Match-3 Fruit Jelly Mania HD FREE
description:
********* Free Candy and Jelly Match 3 Game! *********

************ Addicting Candy-Popping Fun ************

Craving some sweet popping action? Stop yourself from drooling from this awesome candy and jelly elimination game that is sure to get you hooked. Pick your favorite boosts mix, match candies and pop as fast as you can to hit that intense sugar high.

This game brings out your favorite sweets to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Enjoy yummy designs and challenging stages. To play, simply switch and match your way through various levels in this delicious puzzle adventure.

Dip your fingers into the sweetest game ever!

Features:

* Simplistic user interface
* Cute and colorful graphics
* Play with your friends
* Multiple difficulty levels
* Fun for all ages

Indulge your sweet tooth craving!

Download FREE Today!
